long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: iBomma is your indispensable Chrome extension for staying ahead of the curve in the world of Tamil and Hindi cinema. Tailored for movie enthusiasts, Ibomma delivers up-to-date information on upcoming releases, ensuring you never miss a premiere or sneak peek.
